summary: Also known as Eshu (Elegba, Elegua, Legba, Exu). Associated with Esu Odara (Eshu the Good), Esu Laroye (Eshu the Talker), Alaroye (Owner of the Road), Onibode (Gatekeeper), Bara (Father of Roads). Known as Esu Odara (Eshu the Good). Symbolized by crossroads.
description: Also known as Eshu (Elegba, Elegua, Legba, Exu). Associated with Esu Odara (Eshu the Good), Esu Laroye (Eshu the Talker), Alaroye (Owner of the Road), Onibode (Gatekeeper), Bara (Father of Roads). Known as Esu Odara (Eshu the Good). Symbolized by crossroads.
title: Yoruba - Eshu - Orisha of Crossroads and Communication
